de.vinado.spring.mail.javamail.dkim

Class DkimJavaMailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.vinado.spring.mail.javamail.JavaMailSenderDecorator
      • de.vinado.spring.mail.javamail.dkim.DkimJavaMailSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JavaMailSender, MailSender

    public class DkimJavaMailSender
extends JavaMailSenderDecorator
implements JavaMailSender
    Extended JavaMailSenderImpl which signs off MIME messages before shipment.
    Author:
    Vincent Nadoll

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage createSignedMimeMessage(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message)
      This implementation creates a DkimMessage which is signed off with the configured private key before shipment.

      • createSignedMimeMessage

        public javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage createSignedMimeMessage(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message)
                                                        throws MailException
        This implementation creates a DkimMessage which is signed off with the configured private key before shipment.
        Parameters:
        message - must not be null
        Returns:
        new DkimMessage
        Throws:
        MailException - in case copying raw data from the original to the signable message fails
